description:
Summary score for the PROMIS Sleep-Related Impairment instrument, which measures perceptions of alertness, sleepiness, and tiredness during usual waking hours, and the perceived functional impairments during wakefulness associated with sleep problems or impaired alertness.

Each item ranges from 1 to 5. The total score is derived by summing all 8 items and higher scores indicate more severe sleep related impairment. [Yu L et al, 2012 (PMID: 22250775)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3261577/)
